name: nlapi-openapi-specification
description: This project contains the **OpenAPI Documents** for the expert.ai Natural Language API v2 in the form of YAML format files.

scripts.publish: openapi bundle full_nlapi.yaml pii.yaml nlapi.yaml emotional-traits-w-main-groups.yaml geotax-w-geojson.yaml writeprint.yaml temporal-information.yaml -o ./dist/
scripts.lint: openapi lint full_nlapi.yaml pii.yaml nlapi.yaml emotional-traits-w-main-groups.yaml geotax-w-geojson.yaml writeprint.yaml temporal-information.yaml
